TopicTitle: How much time do you spend alt+tabbed out-of-game?

Articles.Content:
How much time do you spend alt+tabbed out-of-game, waiting for e.g. a burn or SAS-guided reorientation?

Edited January 10, 2015 by THX1138
Very little, usually just to change songs or something
Right now I'm browsing the forums waiting for a 42 min burn to complete.

Normally not much.

When doing visual survey missions with a basic jet, hours (I spend the time doing other things, including work).
Very little, just now and then to review or make notes on the list of vessels I keep (staging, action groups, etc)... and to keep my science spreadsheet updated.
Not sure there's much point in keeping a science spreadsheet. I've done only a fraction and I've already opened the entire tech tree.

None. I generally don't plan trips with vessels that have burns longer than ~10 minutes (2.5 minutes with 4x physics.) The only time I'm not actively playing is when I'm waiting on a vessel to get to Eeloo or similar.
Less since you can get porkchop plotting in game now through mods. Mostly the wiki and forums, less than 10% of the time.
I play in a window, so zero.

Not sure there's much point in keeping a science spreadsheet. I've done only a fraction and I've already opened the entire tech tree.

I've only a few things left as far as the tech tree goes, almost there. I made and keep the spreadsheet anyway, my personal goal is to sample all biomes at least once... it helps me keep track.
